name: Art of the Romantic Period
description: Relive the passion and drama of the Romantic era, exploring its iconic artists and masterpieces.

flashcards.question: Which artist painted 'The Raft of the Medusa'?
The Romantic art movement was a reaction against which other art movement?
Which artist painted 'Wanderer Above the Sea of Fog'?
Which British Romantic painter is known for his dramatic landscapes and seascapes?
In which century did the Romantic art movement primarily take place?
Which French Romantic artist is known for the painting 'Liberty Leading the People'?
The Romantic art movement emphasized which of the following: reason or emotion?
Which Romantic poet's life was depicted in the painting 'The Death of Chatterton' by Henry Wallis?
The Romantic movement in art coincided with which literary period?
The Gothic Revival architecture style is associated with which broader art movement?
